Package com.github.siroshun09.messages.api.base

Interface ComponentMessageBase<CS extends ComponentSource>

Type Parameters:
CS - the ComponentSource type
All Superinterfaces:
MessageBase<Component,CS>
All Known Subinterfaces:
LegacyFormatMessageBase, MiniMessageBase
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface ComponentMessageBase<CS extends ComponentSource> extends MessageBase<Component,CS>
An interface that extends MessageBase with Component message type and ComponentSource.
